name: To Do List - Reminder app with alarm
description: A simple and convenient reminder app will allow you to create your to-do list as well as set reminders with alarm  The app is designed to plan your tasks.  Main functions:  To do list Daily Planner - Weekly and Monthly Reminder app with alarm and notification Birthday reminders Goals tracker and planner Task List Plan for the day - Widget  The application is made on the basis of the project GitHub - Recurrence
